title: 2025 Miami GP sprint results - Norris benefits from safety car again to win
summary: In a repeat of the 2024 race, Norris got lucky with the timing of a late safety car to win Miami's sprint race

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 2025 Miami GP sprint race?
What advantage did Lando Norris gain during the 2025 Miami GP sprint race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Timing of a late safety car

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Lando Norris also benefit from a late safety car during the Miami GP sprint race?
